data.title: VOYAGES BY STARLIGHT
data.meta_description: Sauk City, Wisconsin : Arkham House Publishers, Inc., 1997 . Octavo, cloth. First edition. 2542 copies printed. Collects ten stories. The author's first book. MacLeod's first collection combines fantasy, horror, and science fiction, all of them beautifully written. - Anatomy of Wonder 2004 II-696. Joshi Arkham 187. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. #169597
data.text:
MacLeod, Ian R. VOYAGES BY STARLIGHT. [Sauk City, Wisconsin]: Arkham House Publishers, Inc., [1997]. Octavo, cloth. First edition. 2542 copies printed. Collects ten stories. The author's first book. "MacLeod's first collection combines fantasy, horror, and science fiction, all of them beautifully written." - Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-696. Joshi Arkham 187. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#169597).

Price: $75.00
